path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - FTMLaunch Campaign - v1.0.pdf

findings.title: Outdated version of Solidity
findings.description: The required version of Solidity in the FTMlaunch Smart Contract source code is 0.6.12, which is outdated. Updating to 0.8.10 will introduce many features and fix some bugs.

findings.title: StakerContract may cause problems in the future
findings.description: There is no guarantee that StakerContract will not contain any security related issues which could potentially cause problems in the future.
